semantic_description: RabbitMQ publish and consume operations in the core message-processing pipeline are not represented in Jaeger, indicating missing OpenTelemetry instrumentation.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue name variable (e.g., 'order_queue') available at publish/consume time

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' for producer spans and 'receive' for consumer spans

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.message_id
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'BasicProperties.MessageId' field from the RabbitMQ message properties
